message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to sell it to you for $22000. I think this is a fair price considering its unique features and quality.

I'm really interested in the product, but $22000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. I'm willing to pay a premium for a unique item like this, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $15000 is a bit lower than my initial price, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $19000. It's still a great deal considering its unique features and quality.
